title: Textile
medium:
Medium:  cotton
Technique:  plain weave with brocading in chenille yarns
description: Fabric designed by Alexander Morton, inspired by Sardinian peasant embroideries. Large scale symmetrical design with a central urn flanked by peacocks, gazelles, and flowering trees. Brocaded in brilliant polychrome chenille yarns on a beige cotton ground.
